dependencies: Uses org.joda.time.DateTime in code but no explicit Maven dependency found (src/main/java/handler/Handler.java)
deployment_relevant_files: pom.xml (Maven build; shade plugin creates fat jar)
/.github/workflows/release.yml (GitHub Actions release: mvn package + aws lambda update-function-code)
/.github/workflows/infrastructure.yml (GitHub Actions Terraform plan/apply; references ./terraform/ but directory not present in this repo snapshot)
architectural_resources: AWS Lambda function (Java) (implied by aws-lambda-java-core and release workflow updating function code: reminder-bot-lambda)
AWS IAM credentials/secrets for CI/CD (AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID/AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY used in workflows)
External HTTP integration: Telegram Bot API (Handler.java calls https://api.telegram.org/.../sendMessage)
Configuration via environment variables: bot_token, chat_id, half_month_message, end_month_message (Handler.java)
